title: Orchestration Teaching Strategy Design in Technology-Enhanced Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and language education experience
context.additional_context: Targeting corporate language instructors, emphasizing instructional design competencies using real-time collaboration tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.) in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can describe three types of orchestration strategies considering political and cultural contexts in a Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) environment.
Learners can apply two instructional adaptation techniques to overcome technical constraints in Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) environments in actual classes.
Learners can prioritize the use of digital tools (Quizlet, Zoom Breakout Rooms, etc.) according to language education objectives.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
